job description:
Overview and Responsibilities

Supports organizational leadership through patient account based financial and clinical reporting and analysis.

Creates reports and performs analysis on patient-based financial and clinical data.

Use and demonstrate proficiency with all available organizational information systems including Epic, core financial systems and other data sets/warehouses as well as data manipulation and analysis tools.

Perform other tasks as needed including but not limited to tasks in other Physician Revenue Cycle related disciplines.

Qualifications

Minimum

Bachelor's in Accounting, Finance, or related field.

Preferred

3 years financial experience or 1 year of health-care financial experience.
